src/lib/components/Colorbar.react.js.description:
Colorbar Component

A component creating a colorbar with the d3 library.

stops.description: The stops to infer the colorbar from.

labels.description:
Labels for specific positions on the colorbar.
Keys are positions (0 to 1) and values are label texts.

src/lib/components/DashMaplibre.react.js.description:
DashMaplibre Component

A component exposing the MapLibre GL JS library for use in Dash applications.

id.description: The ID of the component, used to identify it in Dash callbacks.

zoom.description: The zoom level of the camera.

max_bounds.description: The maximum bounds of the camera.

style.description: Additional style properties for the map container.

colorbar_map.description: Colorbar configuration for the map colorbar.

colorbar_risk.description: Colorbar configuration for the risk colorbar.

hover_layer.description: The layer ID to attach hover events to.

hover_html.description:
The HTML template for hover popups.
Use {property_name} to interpolate properties from the hovered feature.

setProps.description:
Callback function to set properties in Dash.
This is called with the updated properties when the map state changes.
